name: Stereoscopic-Glitches: Through The Gates
description: UHD 4K mp4 (2160x3840) for vertical displays, 3D glasses (red-cyan) & 3D audio, by Tono C @toocabanelas. Stereoscopic-Glitches is a series of virtual experiments that mix cyber art with analog stereoscopy, the first immersive visual technology, already 170 years old. It is based on AV glitches that interact with 3D (binaural) sounds developed with video game programming techniques, 3D scanning, AI and Deep Learning.
